title: 1.7.2forge安装不了
author: jkkjjbk
txt_content: 我是新手求教！给在论坛上下载的1.7.2安装forge时一点确定就弹出 There is no minecraft launcher profile at this location ，you need to run the launcher first再点确定就什么都没有了。求解决方法。

replies.author: Yooy2002
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Yooy2002 于 2015-2-4 12:32 编辑 

http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=16617163&uk=335950634下载完放进.minecraft文件夹就能装了

replies.author: 乎你熊脸
replies.txt_content: 这是Forge的官网下载地址  http://files.minecraftforge.net/

replies.author: jkkjjbk
replies.txt_content:
Yooy2002 发表于 2015-2-4 11:28
http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=16617163&uk=335950634下载完放进.minecraft文件夹就能装了 ...
成功了！谢谢啊
